item.description: Hi 👋 I am Yuya Koda, a Software Engineer currently employed at DeNA. My professional focus encompasses expertise in infrastructure, with a primary emphasis on AWS. I specialize in areas such as DevOps, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD), and automated testing. Career DeNA Co., Ltd. (Sep 2023 - Present) Retty Inc. (Apr 2020 - Aug 2024)
